list.name: Default
list.comment: fixed some bugs in manbir's code, renamed some files to be more descriptive. tested authorization api for stripe.

task.summary: Setting up a space for Rafael to build something quickly.

got Manbir's method working with emails. All we have to do now is insert hooks that add mails to the mail model with the bodies and texts we have to send when we have to send them. fulfilling the other notification requirements should be really easy now.
